漢羅台文: 七大縣市民進黨縣市長主辦的「本土語言教育問題第一次學術研討會」就知，
台羅: tshit tuā kuān-tshī Bîn-tsìn-tóng kuān-tshī-tiúnn tsú-piān ê “pún-thóo gí-giân kàu-io̍k būn-tê tē-it tshù ha̍k-su̍t gián-thó-huē” tō tsai,
台羅數字調: tshit4 tua7 kuan7-tshi7 bin5-tsin3-tong2 kuan7-tshi7-tiunn2 tsu2-pian7 e5“pun2-thoo2 gi2-gian5 kau3-iok8 bun7-te5 te7-it4 tshu3 hak8-sut8 gian2-tho2-hue7”to7 tsai1,
白話字: chhit tōa koān-chhī Bîn-chìn-tóng koān-chhī-tiúⁿ chú-piān ê“pún-thó͘ gí-giân kàu-io̍k būn-tê tē-it chhù ha̍k-su̍t gián-thó-hōe”tō chai,
